name: Smash Slug
description:
Only one winner. In this struggle between 60 people, an endless action awaits you. In this competition where you will fight for victory, you must develop your strategy, show your skills and use your intelligence on different tracks.

GAME MODES



RACE:

 Dive into a series of ridiculous challenges and wild obstacle courses alongside masses of other rivals online, all in hopes of making their way to the next round of mayhem.


DEATH MATCH:

 Dive into a series of ridiculous challenges and wild obstacle courses alongside masses of other rivals online, all in hopes of making their way to the next round of mayhem.
